featureDescription.name: documentID
featureDescription.description: the document the gene candidate came from

featureDescription.name: startOffset
featureDescription.description: start offset of the gene candidate -- number of non white chars preceeding mention

featureDescription.name: endOffset
featureDescription.description: end offset -- number of non space characters preceeding the end of the string mention.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: the score for this gene candidate -- updated by the various heuristics used to prune gene candidates
